description: Really nice and spacious 4-bedroom apartment in East Village, NY. Nearby to Union Square, Lower East Side, Soho, Chinatown. The bedroom itself is large in the lower lever of the apartment. Very private. Has a full-size bed that can fit 2 people comfortable and a futon which can fit 1 person comfortably. You will have access to the bedroom, living room, kitchen and bathrooms.
name: Big, Beautiful & Private East Village BR Avail
review: The host canceled this reservation 22 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
